description: Attested since 1905 (twelve years earlier than toxify), from de- +‎ tox- +‎ -ify. (Detoxicate is attested one year earlier, since 1904.)

verbs.description: detoxify (third-person singular simple present detoxifies, present participle detoxifying, simple past and past participle detoxified)

entries.meaning: To remove foreign and harmful substances from something.
